QuestData.Title: The Pools of Youth
QuestData.Description: The mogu found the Pools of Youth!$b$bMama Bramblestaff used to tell me old stories about those. During the mogu empire they would use the waters to extend life.$b$bThing is those stories never ended well for some reason. As if the waters were cursed.$b$bEither way, we should investigate. There is a good chance those waters might help Leza.$b$bIt looks like the Pools of Youth are on the northwestern side of the ruins.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover water from the Pools of Youth.
